entries.content: Starting log cleanup analysis for chat-tabs module. Found 98 logger calls across 26 files with significant debug/development noise. Plan: Remove 14 debug logs immediately, downgrade 24 info logs to debug, keep 60 essential logs (errors, warns, critical info). Target: 39% reduction in log volume.

Completed comprehensive log cleanup in chat-tabs module:
- Phase 1: Removed 14 debug logs (FLOW_DEBUGGING, state tracking noise)
- Phase 2: Downgraded 24 excessive info logs to debug level
- Total reduction: 38 logs cleaned (~39% reduction from 98 to 60 essential logs)
- Kept all error/warn logs and critical info logs (initialization, transitions, user actions)
- Result: Much cleaner production output while maintaining debugging capability
